stadium.name: Fletchings Field
stadium.description: Fletchings Field was the first formal Troll Ball stadium in Warden lands. The design balances wood and stone, with arrowhead motifs and banners representing each region under Warden protection. The field includes trees, gully's and other obstacle placements, changed each match by local druids and terrain crafters.

stats.pregame_ritual: Going over the game plan drawn in the dirt with the team captain.
Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Giving the Trollball a heroic backstory before each game.
Headbutting their own team's goal post (gently).
Sticking a specific type of feather in their helmet's plume.
Burying their helmet in the ground and then digging it back up.
Reading their own fortune in a scattering of knuckle bones.
Wearing a specific, garishly colored pair of undergarments.
Always putting on their left gauntlet before their right.

stadium.name: The Unruly Yard
stadium.description: A field in the center of the city's most rebellious district. The stadium is covered in graffiti, the crowd is hostile, and riots are a common post-game (and mid-game) event.

stats.pregame_ritual: Drinking a shot of hot gravy from a dented tin cup.
Arranging their gear in a perfect, aesthetically pleasing spiral.
Testing the heft of their weapon with a series of slow, deliberate swings.
Kissing the Trollball on its stitched 'nose'.
Reviewing hand signals for secret plays.
Refusing to step on any lines on the field before the whistle blows.
Telling a terrible joke to the Trollball to 'loosen it up'.
Dipping their hands in a bucket of ice-cold well water.
Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.
Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Reciting a short, epic poem about a past victory.

preGame:
# ‚öæ THE FINAL SHOWDOWN AT FLETCHINGS FIELD! ‚öæ

Holy Mackerel, sports fans! This is the one we‚Äôve been waiting for! Nok the Corrupter here, coming to you live for Game Five‚Äîthe winner-take-all, the grandest of finales in this Tuesday Night Trollball spectacular! The series is knotted up at two apiece, and the atmosphere here in Warden territory is absolutely electric! We are back at **Fletchings Field**, where the druids have been busy shifting the terrain all morning. I‚Äôve seen three trees walk more miles today than a Guild of the Black Sky accountant! üå≥

Take a look at the home favorites, **Oak & Onslaught**! They are more popular than a fresh soul in the Demon Prison right now, and the crowd is roaring! I just spotted **Wynnie Faina** and **Normi Glaudia** going through their warm-ups with their boots on the wrong feet‚Äîa tactical masterclass in Warden superstition! And over there, **Hole Bowerman** is elbow-deep in the dirt, burying her helmet like a metal-headed squirrel. I suppose if you want to protect your noggin, you‚Äôve got to let it commune with the earth first! üå∞

But don't you dare overlook the **New Monteforte Chaos Creatures**! They‚Äôve fought their way up from the Loser‚Äôs side and aren't about to roll over for some leafy rangers! **Lian Denton** is currently downing a shot of hot gravy from a dented tin cup‚Äînow that‚Äôs a beverage that‚Äôll put hair on your chest and lead in your swing! **Boulanger Procto** is nearby, meticulously arranging his broadsword and gear in a perfect spiral. It‚Äôs almost a shame it‚Äôs about to be covered in Warden blood! üåÄ

The open bar is in full swing, and the fans are already looking a bit wobbly on those shifting bleachers. Will **Sir Randy** and his fancy-pants rangers manage to keep the trophy here, or will the Monteforte rebels ruin the party? My demonic heart is pitter-pattering for the carnage! Let‚Äôs play Trollball! üî•üèÄ
postGame:
# üèÜ CHAOS REIGNS! THE CREATURES CLAIM THE CROWN! üèÜ

Great Orzalon's beard, what a finish! You can hear the collective gasp of the Warden faithful from here to the Demon Prison! The **New Monteforte Chaos Creatures** have done the impossible, coming into Fletchings Field and snatching a 3-2 victory in Game Five to win the Grand Finals! The "heroes" of Oak & Onslaught are left staring at the mud while the rebels celebrate in the ruins of their stadium! üèüÔ∏è‚ú®

The match started with a spark of hope for the home team when **Affra Yanaton** snatched a wild pass from Raouf Dragone right out of the air! Interception! The crowd went wild, but the joy was short-lived. **Wolbrom Ariella**, likely fueled by those out-of-tune sea shanties, delivered a scythe tackle to Teria Ravo that sounded like a tree splitting in a gale! Teria went down hard and was hauled off to the healers before the first five minutes were up! üöë

But the Wardens aren't known for giving up easily. **Normi Glaudia**, boots still on the wrong feet, found a sliver of space in Center Field. He launched the Trollball with the precision of a master builder, and‚ÄîSWISH‚Äîa 2-point Shoot! Oak & Onslaught took an early 2-0 lead, and for a moment, it looked like Sir Randy‚Äôs favorites might actually pull it off. The stadium was rocking, and the shifting terrain seemed to favor the leafy losers! üéØüå≥

However, the Chaos Creatures thrive in the grit. As we hit halftime, the players were looking more than a little worse for wear. The open bar has clearly affected the crowd, as half the fans were cheering for the wrong team and the other half were trying to fight the moving trees! Healer **Ahron Latashia** was busier than a one-armed wallpaper hanger, stitching the Wardens back together for the final push. üç∫üè•

The second half turned into a literal parade of pain! **Fogel Raynold** wasted no time, leveling Ema Ulrick with a horseman's pick tackle that left her seeing stars! Then **Placido Kora** decided Hole Bowerman‚Äôs helmet-burying ritual hadn't worked well enough, sending the lancer to the sidelines with a crunch that echoed off the Warden‚Äôs Watch! It was a masterpiece of tactical violence, and I loved every second of it! ü¶¥

Oak & Onslaught tried to fire back! **Abner Seidel** caught Boulanger Procto with a tackle that surely rattled every gear in that aesthetically pleasing spiral! Boulanger was sent to the infirmary, leaving the Chaos Creatures temporarily shorthanded. But just when the Wardens thought they had the upper hand, the Monteforte squad showed their true colors‚Äîpure, unadulterated rebellion! ‚õìÔ∏è

The comeback began with a play that‚Äôll be talked about in the back alleys of New Monteforte for years. **Wolbrom Ariella** fired a laser of a pass to the recently-returned **Boulanger Procto** right in the End Zone! Procto didn't just score; he dunked that troll head into the goal with enough force to make the druids cry! That cut the lead to 2-1 and shifted the momentum entirely! üèÄüí•

Then came the dagger in the heart of the Wardens. **Tucker Hett** found herself with the ball in Center Field. With the defense closing in and the terrain shifting under her feet, she launched a prayer of a shot! It sailed through the air, past the reaching hands of the defenders, and through the hoop for a **2-point Shoot**! Just like that, the Chaos Creatures surged ahead 3-2! The silence from the Warden fans was absolutely delicious! üéØüò±

In the final moments, Oak & Onslaught looked like they‚Äôd spent too much time sampling the open bar. Their passes were sloppy, their runs were sluggish, and they couldn't find an answer for the Monteforte wall. **Alben Diantha** was everywhere, picking up the ball and keeping it away from the desperate Warden reach. By the time the final whistle blew, the field was a mess of graffiti, broken gear, and broken dreams! üèõÔ∏è

The series ends 3-2 for the Creatures, giving us a Reset! One last round, one final battle, and we can truly name our Champions! This is Nok the Corrupter, signing off from the most beautiful bloodbath in the realm! Stay violent, sports fans! üî•ü§ò
